src: "그는 ""현재 4개월 된 당뇨병에서 치료된 생쥐가 있다""고 덧붙였다."
mt: "He added, 'There are mice that have been treated for diabetes for four months.'"
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: 노바스코샤주 핼리팩스의 댈하우지대학교 의과 교수이자 캐나다 당뇨 협회 임상과학부 의장인 Ehud Ur 박사는 이 연구가 아직 초기 단계라고 경고했습니다.
mt: Ehud Ur, a Dalhousie University medical professor and president of the Canadian Diabetes Association's clinical science division in Halifax, Nova Scotia, warned the research is still in its early stages.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: 다른 전문가들과 마찬가지로, 그는 당뇨병의 치료 여부에 회의적이며, 이러한 결과는 제1형 당뇨병 환자에게는 관련이 없음을 지적합니다.
mt: Like other experts, he is skeptical of the treatment of diabetes, and he points out that these results are unrelated to patients with type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: 월요일 스웨덴 한림원 노벨상 문학위원회 사무총장 사라 다니우스는 스웨덴 스베리예스 라디오의 라디오 프로그램에서 위원회는 2016년 노벨 문학상 수상 소식을 밥 딜런에게 직접 전달하는 것이 불가능하여 그에게 연락을 취하려는 노력을 포기했다고 공개적으로 발표했습니다.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, secretary of the Swedish Academy's Nobel Literature Committee, announced publicly that the committee had given up on trying to contact Bob Dylan to inform him personally of his 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: "대니어스(Danius)는 ""지금 우리는 아무것도 하지는 않고 있다. 그의 가장 가까운 협력자에게 전화를 걸어 이메일을 보냈고 매우 친절한 답장을 받았다. 현재로서는 확실히 그것으로 충분하다."""
mt: "Danius said: "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called his closest collaborator and sent an email and got a very friendly answer. For now, that's enough."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: 링의 CEO인 제이미 시미노프 (Jamie Siminoff)는 차고에 있던 그의 숍에서 초인종 소리를 들을 수 없었을 때 회사를 시작했다고 말했습니다.
mt: Jamie Siminoff, CEO of Ring, started the company when he couldn't hear the doorbell in his garage.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: 그는 무선 도어벨(Wi-Fi doorbell)을 만들었다고 말했다.
mt: He said he made a wireless doorbell (Wi-Fi doorbell).
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff는 2013년, 쇼 출연자가 스타트업의 자금 지원을 거절했었던 Shark Tank 에피소드에 출연한 이후 매출이 증가했다고 말했습니다.
mt: 2013, Siminoff appeared on Shark Tank, an episode where a show contestant was rejected by a startup's funding, sales have increased since then.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: 2017년 말, 시미노프는 쇼핑 텔레비젼 채널인 QVC에 출연했다.
mt: 2017, Siminovitch appeared on the shopping television channel QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring은 경쟁 보안회사인 ADT 사와의 소송 또한 합의를 보았다.
mt: Ring also settled a lawsuit with security company ADT.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: 한 실험용 백신이 에볼라 사망률을 줄일 수 있을 것처럼 보이지만, 지금까지 어떤 약도 기존의 감염을 치료하는데 적합하다고 명확하게 입증되지 않았습니다.
mt: One experimental vaccine appears to reduce Ebola mortality, but no drug has yet been proven to treat existing infections.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: 항체 칵테일 지맵(ZMapp)은 초기에는 그 분야에서 가능성을 보였지만, 공식적인 연구들에 의하면 죽음을 방지하는 효과가 기대보다 작다고 합니다.
mt: Antibody cocktail ZMapp was initially promising in the field, but official researches say its effectiveness in preventing death is less than expected.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: PALM 실험에서 ZMapp은 대조군의 역할을 했습니다. 즉, 과학자들은 ZMapp을 기준치로 사용했고 다른 세 가지 치료법을 이와 비교했습니다.
mt: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as the control. In other words, scientists used ZMapp as the baseline and compared it to the other three treatments.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: 미국 체조 협회는 미국 올림픽 위원회의 서한을 지지하며, 미국의 전 운동선수가 안전한 환경을 가질 수 있도록 돕는 올림픽 관계자의 절대적 필요성을 인정합니다.
mt: The United States Gymnastics Association supports the letter from the United States Olympic Committee, recognizing the absolute necessity of Olympic officials to help ensure safe environments for American athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: 저희는 탈퇴가 아닌 조직 내에서 의미있는 변화를 추구함으로써 선수와 구단과 그리고 스포츠에 더 나은 결과를 가져올 수 있다는 USOC의 주장에 동의합니다.
mt: We agree with the USOC's assertion that we can bring better results to the athletes, the teams, and the sports by seeking meaningful change within our organization, not by withdrawing.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: 미국 체조단은 래리 나사르의 피해자들이 그동안 용기 있게 밝혀왔던 사실들이 어떻게 오랫동안 밝혀지지 않았으며 다시는 이런 일이 없도록 필요하고 적절한 조치를 취하기 위한 독립적인 조사를 지지한다.
mt: The U.S. gymnastics team supports an independent investigation to ensure that appropriate and necessary steps are taken to prevent such incidents from happening again, after the victims of Larry Nassar have courageously come forward with the facts of how these incidents were allowed to occur for so long.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: 미국 체조 대표팀과 USOC는 같은 목표를 가지고 있습니다. 선수들이 안전하고 긍정적이며 격려 받는 환경에서 꿈을 좇을 수 있도록 체조 등의 스포츠를 가능한 한 안전하게 만드는 것입니다.
mt: The U.S. gymnastics team and USOC share the same goal: to make gymnastics and other sports as safe as possible so that athletes can pursue their dreams in a safe, positive and supportive environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: 1960년대에 걸쳐 브레진스키는 케네디의 고문으로 근무한 후 린든 존슨 행정부에서 근무했다.
mt: 1960s, Brezinski served as an advisor to Kennedy and later worked in the Johnson administration.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: 그는 1976년 선발 과정에서 카터에게 외교정책에 대해 조언한 뒤 1977년부터 1981년까지 헨리 키신저의 뒤를 이어 국가 안보담당 대통령 보좌관(NSA)을 지냈습니다.
mt: He advised Carter on foreign policy during the 1976 presidential selection process and served as national security adviser to President Jimmy Carter from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: 그는 NSA로서 1978년 캠프 데이비드 어코드, 1970년대 후반에 미국과 중국의 관계 정상화, 1979년 이란 인질 위기로 이어진 이란 혁명, 1979년 소련의 아프가니스탄 침공과 같은 세계 문제를 외교적으로 다루는 일에서 카터 대통령을 보좌하였습니다.
mt: He served as National Security Advisor to President Carter from 1978 to 1977, helping to normalize relations between the United States and China, dealing with the Iranian Revolution and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, and the Iran hostage crisis.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: 라이언 고슬링과 엠마 스톤이 출연한 이 영화는 모든 주요 부문에서 후보에 올랐다.
mt: Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone starred in the film, which was nominated in all major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: 라이언 고슬링과 엠마 스톤은 각각 남우주연상과 여우주연상 후보에 올랐습니다.
mt: Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone are both nominated for Best Actor and Best Actress.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: 다른 부문으로는 최우수 작품상, 감독상, 촬영상, 의상 디자인, 영화 편집상, 작곡상, 제작상, 사운드 편집상, 사운드 믹싱, 오리지널 각본상에 후보로 올라있다.
mt: It is also nominated for Best Picture, Best Director, Best Cinematography, Costume Design, Film Editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing, and Original Screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: 그 영화에서 나오는 오디션(꿈꾸는 바보들)과 시티 오브 스타 두 곡이 베스트 주제곡 후보에 올랐습니다. 라이온스게이트 스튜디오는 다른 스튜디오보다 월등히 많은 26개의 후보 지명을 받았습니다.
mt: 2 songs from the film, "Dreams Are Made of This" and "City of Stars," are nominated for Best Original Song. Lionsgate Studios received 26 nominations, more than any other studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: 도널드 트럼프 미국 대통령은 늦은 일요일 시간대에 대변인을 통해 발표한 성명에서 미군이 시리아에서 철수할 것이라고 발표했다.
mt: Donald Trump announced in a statement released late Sunday that U.S. troops will be withdrawn from Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: 이 발표는 트럼프가 레제프 타이이프 에르도안 터키 대통령과 전화 통화를 한 후에 이루어졌다.
mt: This announcement came after Trump spoke by phone with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: 또한 터키는 유럽 국가들이 본국으로 송환하는 것을 거부한 체포된 ISIS 전투기를 보호할 것이라고 밝혔다.
mt: Turkey also said it would protect captured ISIS fighters from being returned to their home countries, which some European nations have refused to do.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: 이것은 적어도, 이미 널리 알려진 이론인, 몇몇 공룡들이 깃털을 가지고 있었다는 것을 확인 시켜 줄 뿐만 아니라, 색깔과 3차원 배열과 같이 일반적으로 화석만으론 부족한 세부적인 사항들을 제공한다.
mt: This will not only confirm the widely held theory that some dinosaurs had feathers, but also provide details such as color and three-dimensional arrangement, which are usually lacking in fossils.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: . 과학자들은 이 공룡 깃털의 윗쪽이 진갈색이고 아랫쪽은 희거나 노란빛이었다고 밝혔다.
mt: Scientists say the dinosaur's feathers were light brown on top and white or yellow underneath.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: 그러한 발견은 또한 조류에 있어서 깃털의 진화에 대한 통찰을 제공한다.
mt: Such discoveries also provide insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: 공룡 깃털은 우축이라고 불리는 잘 발달된 깃대가 없지만 미늘과 작은 깃가지 같은 다른 특징적인 깃털을 가지고 있으며 연구자들은 이런 다른 특징들이 나중에 진화하여 우축으로 발전했을 것이라고 추측했습니다.
mt: The dinosaur feathers had well-developed quill knobs, but lacked the rachis, and other distinctive features, which the researchers speculated had evolved into the quill knobs later.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: 깃털의 구조는 비행 용이 아니라 체온 조절이나 과시용으로 쓰였음을 암시한다. 연구원들은 어린 공룡의 꼬리에서 나온 샘플을 조사하니 유아의 솜털이 아닌 성인 공룡의 깃털이라고 이야기하였다.
mt: The structure of feathers suggests they were used for temperature regulation or display, not flight. Researchers say they examined samples from the tail of a young dinosaur and found it had adult feathers, not baby down.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: 이것은 젊은 공룡의 꼬리이지만, 샘플을 보면 어린 개체의 솜털이 아닌 성체의 깃털임을 알 수 있다고 연구진은 말합니다.
mt: This is a young dinosaur's tail, but the sample shows that the feathers are not downy, but adult, according to the researchers.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: 어제 아침 터키 가지안테프에 있는 경찰서에서 폭발한 차량 폭탄으로 인해 경찰관 2명이 죽고 20명 이상의 다른 사람들이 다쳤습니다.
mt: 2 police officers were killed and over 20 others were injured when a car bomb exploded outside a police station in Gaziantep, Turkey, this morning.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: 그 주지사는 부상자 중 19명이 경찰관이라고 말했다.
mt: 19 of the injured were police officers, the mayor said.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: 경찰은 공격에 대한 책임이 있다고 주장되는 다에시(ISIL) 무장세력에게 혐의를 두고 있다고 밝혔습니다.
mt: Police say they are holding suspects on suspicion of being linked to the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: 그들은 해가 다른 별들과 같이 발광성과 회전의 원리만으로 작동한다는 것을 발견했습니다.
mt: They discovered that they work the same way as stars, with the exception of their rotation and luminosity.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: 발광도와 회전을 함께 사용해 별의 로스비 번호를 결정하는데, 이는 혈장 흐름(plasma flow)과 관련이 있다.
mt: Using both the brightness and the rotation to determine the Rossby number of a star, which is related to the plasma flow.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: 로스비 수(Rossby number)가 작을수록 자기 역전 면에서 항성의 활동성 역시 작다.
mt: The Rossby number is the ratio of the Coriolis force to the inertial force. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star is on its magnetic reversal surface.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: 여행 중에 이와사키는 여러 번 난관에 봉착했다.
mt: During his travels, Ishiaki encountered several obstacles.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: 그는 해적들에게 강도 당하고, 티베트에서 미친개에게 공격당했으며, 네팔에서는 거의 결혼할 뻔했고 인도에서 체포되었다.
mt: He was robbed by pirates, attacked by a mad dog in Tibet, almost married in Nepal, and arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: 802.11n 표준은 2.4GHz와 5.0GHz 주파수 모두에서 작동합니다.
mt: 802.11n standard works on both 2.4GHz and 5.0GHz frequencies.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: 기지국에 이중 라디오가 있다면 이것이 802.11a, 802.11b와 802.11g가 이전 기종이라도 호환할 수 있게 해준다.
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b, and 802.11g are backwards compatible with this dual radio base station.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: 802.11n은 이론상 최대 600Mbit/s의 대역폭을 가져 기존 표준에 비해 상당히 빠릅니다.
mt: 802.11n has a theoretical maximum bandwidth of 600Mbit/s, much faster than previous standards.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: 이 이야기에 관계된 두 명의 성인 자녀를 둔 기혼자인 듀발은 밀러에게 깊은 인상을 남기지 않았습니다.
mt: Duval, who is married and has two adult children, did not make a deep impression on Miller.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: "의견을 물었을 때 밀러는 ""청문회 동안 마이크는 많은 이야기를 했습니다… 저는 준비를 하고 있었기 때문에 그가 하는 말을 듣지 못했습니다""라고 말했습니다."
mt: "When asked for his opinion, Miller said, 'There was a lot of talk on the microphone during the hearing... I was prepared so I didn't hear what he was saying.'"
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: "후 주석은 ""2020년까지는 GDP 단위당 이산화탄소 방출량을 2005년 수준에서 현저한 폭으로 감소시키려고 노력할 것입니다""라고 말했습니다."
mt: "Hou said China would "make great efforts to reduce its carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a significant margin by 2020 compared with the 2005 level.""
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: 그는 감산 규모는 중국의 경제 생산량을 바탕으로 정해질 것이라면서 수치를 밝히지 않았습니다.
mt: He said the cut would be based on China's economic output, but did not give a figure.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: "후는 개발도상국들이 ""일단 오염시키고 나중에 치우는 옛 방식을 탈피하도록"" 격려했습니다."
mt: "They urged developing countries to ""move away from the old approach of polluting first and cleaning up later""."
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: "후 주석은 ""그렇다 해서 그들에게 그 발달단계와 책임 범위, 능력을 벗어나는 의무를 지라고 요구해서는 안 된다""라고 덧붙였다."
mt: "Hou said, ""Just because they have that responsibility doesn't mean they can demand that they have the obligation to go beyond their stage of development and their scope and capacity.""
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: 이라크 스터디 그룹은 오늘 12시 GMT(그리치니 표준시)에 리포트를 발표했다.
mt: The Iraq Study Group will release its report at 12 noon GMT (Greenville Standard Time) today.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: 이 시점에서 이라크의 행동이 종파적인 전쟁이나 폭력이 증가하는 것, 혹은 혼돈의 상태를 막을 수 있다는 데에 보장은 없다.
mt: At this point, Iraq's actions do not guarantee that sectarian war or violence will not increase, or that chaos will be prevented.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: 보고서는 미국의 중동 정책에 관해 공개 토론과 의견 일치 형성에 대한 탄원으로 시작한다.
mt: The report begins with a petition for open discussion and consensus building on U.S. Middle East policy.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: 보고서는 행정부의 현재 이라크 정책에 대해 거의 모든 측면에서 매우 비판적이며 즉각적인 방향 변경을 촉구합니다.
mt: The report is highly critical of the current Iraqi policy of the government in almost all aspects and urges immediate direction change.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: 우선 78개 권고안 중 하나는 이라크의 적대적 개입에 대비하여 국경을 확보하고 이웃 국가들과의 외교 관계를 재정립하기 위해 올해 말이 되기 전에 새로운 외교 정책을 취해야 한다는 것입니다.
mt: 78 recommendations, one of which is to secure borders and re-establish diplomatic relations with neighboring countries by the end of the year in order to prepare for hostile intervention in Iraq.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: 현 상원 의원 겸 아르헨티나 대통령 부인 크리스티나 페르난데스 데 키르치네르(Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner)는 어제저녁 부에노스아이레스(Buenos Aires)에서 50km 떨어진 라 플라타(La Plata)에서 대선 출마를 선언했다.
mt: Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner, the current Argentine Senate president and wife of the current Argentine president, announced her candidacy for the presidency last night in La Plata, 50 km from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: 키르치네르 여사는 2005년 부에노스아이레스 지방 대표단의 일원으로 상원 의원 선거운동을 시작할 때와 같은 장소인 아르헨티나 극장에서 대통령 출마 의사를 밝혔다.
mt: 2005, when she began her campaign for a Senate seat as a member of the Buenos Aires Province delegation, she announced her intention to run for president at the same place, the Argentine Theatre.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: 카트리나 태풍 후에 구호물자와 재건축을 위한 지출을, 국가 재정에 보수적인 태도를 취하는 사람들이 '부시의 뉴올리언스 거래'로 일컬으면서 논쟁이 일어났다.
mt: 2005's Hurricane Katrina relief and rebuilding spending, which was criticized by some as "Bush's New Orleans deal," was a point of contention.
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: 재건 활동에 대한 리버럴 측 비판은 소위 워싱턴 내부자들에게 재건 관련 계약이 돌아간 것에 초점을 맞추었습니다.
mt: Liberal criticism of the rebuilding effort has focused on so-called Washington insiders who got contracts for the rebuilding.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: 400만 명이 넘는 사람들이 장례식 참석을 위해 로마로 모여들었습니다.
mt: 400,000 people or more are expected to attend the funeral in Rome.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: 참석한 인원수가 너무 많은 나머지 대부분이 성 베드로 광장에서 치러진 장례식에 입장할 수 없었습니다.
mt: Due to the large number of people attending, most were unable to enter the funeral mass held in St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: 대형 텔레비전 스크린 여러 대가 로마 곳곳에 설치되어 사람들이 장례식을 관람할 수 있도록 했습니다.
mt: Large television screens were set up in various places in Rome so people could watch the funeral.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: 이탈리아 내 많은 도시들과 전 세계의 다른 도시 들내에서도, 특히나 폴란드, 비슷한 스크린들이 설치되어서 많은 사람들이 볼 수 있도록 하였습니다.
mt: In many cities in Italy and other cities around the world, especially in Poland, similar screens were installed so that many people could see them.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: 역사학자들은 FBI의 성공률을 일부러 높이기 위해 도난 차량 사건과 같이 쉬운 사건에만 초점을 두고 자원을 집중하는 과거의 FBI 정책을 비판해 왔다.
mt: Historians have criticized the FBI's past policy of focusing resources on easy cases like car thefts, in order to artificially inflate its success rate.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: 미 의회는 2005년도 예산부터 외설 방지책 자금을 배정했으며, FBI에서 성인 포르노 분야에 10명의 요원을 반드시 배치할 것을 특정했다.
mt: 2005, the U.S. Congress began allocating funds for obscenity prevention, and the FBI was required to assign at least ten agents to the adult pornography industry.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: 로빈 우타파(Robin Uthappa)가 이닝 최고점을 기록했다. 4점 11개와 6점 2개로 41 투구만에 70 런을 쳐 이닝 최고점을 기록했다.
mt: 4th baseman Robin Uthappa recorded the highest score in an inning. He hit 70 runs in 41 pitches with 4 points 11 and 6 points 2.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: 중간 순서 크리켓 배트맨인 사친 텐둘카르와 라훌 드라비드는 훌륭한 성적을 냈으며 100런 파트너쉽을 이뤄냈습니다.
mt: Middle-order batsmen Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid put up a fine score and made a 100-run partnership.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: 하지만, 주장이 위킷(wicket)을 잃은 후 인도는 이닝을 끝내기 위해 7개의 위킷을 잃으며 36득점을 했을 뿐이다.
mt: But, after losing the wicket, India lost 7 wickets and scored 36 runs to end the innings.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: 조지 W. 부시 미합중국 대통령은 11월 16일 아침 싱가포르에 도착하는 것으로 일주일에 걸치는 아시아 순방을 시작하였다.
mt: 11월 16일 아침에 싱가포르에 도착하는 것으로 시작되는 일주일에 걸친 아시아 순방을 시작하였다.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: 그는 싱가포르 부총리 웡칸셍의 환영을 받았고 싱가포르 총리 리셴룽과 무역 및 테러 문제를 논의하였습니다.
mt: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: 부시는 중간 선거에서 일주일 내내 이어진 패배 이후, 아시아에서의 무역 확장 정책을 발표했습니다.
mt: Bush announced a new trade expansion policy in Asia after losing the midterm elections for a week.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: 스티븐 하퍼 총리는 화요일 PMO에서 NDP 대표 잭 레이턴과의 25분 회담을 끝낸 후, 정부의 '대기 오염 방지법'을 두 번째로 읽기 전에 모든 당무회에 보내 검토하게 하는데 동의했습니다.
mt: Stephen Harper read the NDP's proposed "anti-pollution bill" for the second time before sending it to all caucus members for review.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: "레이튼(Layton)은 총리와의 면담에서 보수당의 환경 법안을 ""철저히, 완전하게 재작성"" 할 것을 요청하며, 보수당의 환경 법안에 대한 변경을 촉구했다."
mt: "Layton asked the prime minister to 'thoroughly and completely rewrite' the Conservative Party's environmental bill in a meeting with the prime minister, and urged changes to the Conservative Party's environmental bill."
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: 연방정부가 타즈마니아 데본포트에 있는 머시 병원의 자금을 인수하기 위해 개입했을 때부터, 주 정부와 일부 연방 하원 의원들은 이러한 행동이 11월에 있을 연방선거전의 일환으로 쓰일 거라고 비난해왔다.
mt: The federal government has been accused of using the move to take over funding for the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, as a pre-election ploy ahead of the November federal election, since it intervened when the state government was taking over funding.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: 그러나 존 하워드 총리는 이번 조치는 태즈메이니아 정부에 의해 병원 시설이 격하되는 것을 막기 위한 것이라고 말하며 4,500만 달러를 추가로 지급했다.
mt: However, Premier John Howard said the move was to prevent the downgrading of hospital facilities and added another $450 million.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: 최근 속보에 의하면, 쓰나미가 발생했을 때의 해수면 수치가 기록되었으며, 실제로 파고 파고와 니우에 근처에 쓰나미가 강타했다고 밝혀졌다.
mt: Recent reports indicate that the tsunami's water level was recorded at the time of the tsunami, and it was actually hit by a tsunami near Pago Pago and Niué.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: 통가에선 큰 피해나 부상자들이 보고되지는 않았지만, 전력 수급이 일시적으로 끊겨 통가 당국이 PTWC에서 발령한 쓰나미 경보를 받지 못한 것으로 알려졌습니다.
mt: There have been no reports of major damage or injuries in Tonga, but the country's power supply was temporarily cut off, and it is known that the Tongan government did not receive the tsunami warning issued by PTWC.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: 해안지대 또는 그 주변에 있는 14개의 하와이 소재 학교는 경보가 해제되었음에도 지난 수요일 휴교하였습니다.
mt: 14 schools on or near the coast of Hawaii were closed Wednesday despite the all-clear.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: 조지 W. 부시 미국 대통령은 이 같은 발표를 환영했습니다.
mt: George W. Bush, former U.S. president, welcomed the announcement.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: "부시의 대변인 고든 존드로는 북한의 약속에 대해 ""한반도의 비핵화를 달성하기 위한 주요 단계""라고 평했습니다."
mt: "Bush's spokesman Gordon Johndroe said the North Korean promise was "a major step toward achieving the goal of a nuclear-free Korean Peninsula.""
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: 대서양 허리케인의 열 번째 폭풍인 아열대 폭풍 제리가 오늘 대서양에서 생성되었습니다.
mt: 10th Atlantic hurricane of the season, Tropical Storm Jerry, formed today in the Atlantic.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: 미국 국립 허리케인 센터 (NHC)에 의하면, 태풍 제리는 더 이상 위협이 되지 않는다.
mt: According to the National Hurricane Center, Typhoon Jelawat is no longer a threat.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: 미국 공병대는 시간당 6인치의 강우량이 기 파손된 제방을 무너뜨릴 수 있다고 추정했다.
mt: 6 inches of rain per hour was estimated to be enough to collapse a breached levee.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: 허리케인 카트리나 때 최고 20 feet 높이의 홍수를 겪은 나인스 워드(the Ninth Ward)는 현재 근처 제방이 범람하면서 허리 높이까지 차오르고 있다.
mt: 9th Ward, which experienced up to 20 feet of flooding during Hurricane Katrina, is now seeing the levee near it overtopping, and is up to the roof.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: 100피트 너비의 제방 너머로 물이 흘러넘칩니다.
mt: 100-foot-wide levee overflows with water.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Commons 관리자 Adam Cuerden은 지난달 위키 뉴스와의 통화에서 삭제에 대한 불만을 드러냈다.
mt: Commons administrator Adam Cuerden revealed his dissatisfaction with deletions in an interview with Wiki News last month.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: """그 (웨일즈)는 처음부터 우리에게 거짓말했어요. 먼저 이 모든 것이 법적인 이유 때문이라고 했고, 또 삭제하기 직전까지 우리의 말을 듣는 것처럼 행동했죠."" "
mt: "He lied to us from the start. First he said it was for legal reasons, and then he acted like he was listening to us right up until the last minute."
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: 최근 공동체적 반감으로 인해 수백만 개의 공개 라이선스 미디어가 실린 사이트의 성적 콘텐츠에 관한 정책 시안을 작성하기 위한 노력이 생겨났습니다.
mt: Efforts to draft a policy proposal for the content of sexual nature on sites with millions of publicly licensed media have been born recently due to communal antipathy.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: 비록 대부분 이론에 의존하긴 해도 프로그램은 궁수자리 은하 관측을 시뮬레이션하도록 짜여 있습니다.
mt: While most of the program is theoretical, it is designed to simulate observations of the Andromeda galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: 팀이 찾고 있던 효과는 은하계의 암흑물질과 은하수의 암흑물질 사이의 기조력에 의해 발생했을 수 있습니다.
mt: The team believes the effect they were looking for could have been caused by the gravitational pull between the dark matter of the galaxy and the dark matter of the intergalactic space.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: 달이 지구에 당기는 힘을 발휘하여 조수를 일으키듯이, 은하수도 궁수자리 은하계에 힘을 발휘한다.
mt: The Milky Way exerts a force on the galaxy like the Moon pulls the tides, exerting a force on the galaxy.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: 과학자들은 암흑물질이 일반 물질과 같은 방식으로 다른 암흑물질에 영향을 준다고 결론지었습니다.
mt: Scientists concluded that dark matter affects other dark matter in the same way that ordinary matter does.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: 이 이론에 따르면 은하계 주변 암흑물질의 대부분은 마치 후광처럼 은하계 주위에 자리 잡고 있으며, 대량의 작은 입자들로 구성되어 있다.
mt: According to this theory, most of the dark matter in the galaxy is located around the galaxy like a halo, and is composed of large numbers of small particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: TV 보도는 공장에서 나오는 흰 연기를 보여줍니다.
mt: TV reports show white smoke coming from the factory.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: 현지 당국은 그 발전소 인근 주민들에게 실내에 머물며 에어컨을 끄고 수돗물을 마시지 말라고 경고하고 있다.
mt: Local authorities are warning residents near the power plant to stay indoors, turn off air conditioning and not drink tap water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: 일본의 핵 관련 정부 기관에 따르면, 방사성 세슘과 요오드가 발전소에서 검출되었다고 한다.
mt: According to Japan's nuclear-related government agencies, radioactive cesium and iodine were detected at the plant.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: 당국은 이것이 현장에서 우라늄 연료를 보관하는 컨테이너가 파열되어 누출되고 있다는 것을 나타낸다고 추정한다.
mt: Authorities believe this indicates a container holding uranium fuel at the site ruptured and leaked.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: 토니 몰 박사는 남아공 지역인 콰줄루나탈에서 XDR-TB(약물 내성 결핵)를 발견했습니다.
mt: Tony Moll, a South African doctor, discovered XDR-TB in the KwaZulu-Natal region.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: 그는 인터뷰에서 새로운 변종이 '치명률이 무척 높아 아주 대처하기 어려우며 두렵다고 언급했다.
mt: He said in an interview that the new strain was "very deadly and very difficult to deal with, and very scary."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Moll 박사는 일부 환자가 병원에서 질병에 감염되었을 수 있다고 생각하며, 그중 적어도 2명은 건강한 병원 근로자였을 것으로 생각했습니다.
mt: Dr. Moll said some patients may have been infected with the disease in the hospital, and at least two were healthy hospital workers.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
